document.publication: The Poems of Emily Dickinson, Variorum Edition, Franklin, 1998
document.full_text: <xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan"> </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">The </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#a8e0ff">Butterfly </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">in </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#a8e0ff">honored </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#a8e0ff">Dust </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#a8e0ff">Assuredly </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">will </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#a8e0ff">lie </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">But </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">none </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">will </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#a8e0ff">pass </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">the </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#a8e0ff">Catacomb </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">So </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#a8e0ff">chastened </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">as </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">the </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#a8e0ff">Fly </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p>
document.title: The butterfly in honored dust
